patthana8.1:2.1_0: Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nahetuṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…
patthana8.1:2.1_1: dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ;
patthana8.1:2.1_3: (yāva mahābhūtā.) Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca na nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nahetū khandhe paṭicca hetū;
patthana8.1:2.1_5: nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ca na nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.1:3.1_0: Na nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca na nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.1:3.1_1: Na nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.1:3.1_2: Na nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ca na nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.1:4.1_0: Nahetuñca na nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.1:4.1_1: Nahetuñca na nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca na nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.1:4.1_2: Nahetuñca na nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ca na nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.1:5.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava.
patthana8.1:7.1_0: Na nahetu dhammo na nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.1:7.1_1: Na nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.1:7.1_2: Na nahetu dhammo nahetussa ca na nahetussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.1:8.1_0: Nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.1:8.1_1: Nahetu dhammo na nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.1:8.1_2: Nahetu dhammo nahetussa ca na nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.1:9.1_0: Na nahetu dhammo na nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.1:9.1_1: Na nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.1:9.1_2: Na nahetu dhammo nahetussa ca na nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.1:10.1_0: Nahetu ca na nahetu ca dhammā nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.1:10.1_1: Nahetu ca na nahetu ca dhammā na nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana8.1:10.1_2: Nahetu ca na nahetu ca dhammā nahetussa ca na nahetussa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
